name: Pinball VERSUS
description:
Hi, 

this is my first, little project. In Pinball VERSUS you can play against your friend in VERSUS mode or with your friend in CO-OP mode. Game does not have AI or multiplayer via internet so you need to actually have some real friends! Or be skillful enough to play CO-OP mode alone! I hope you will enjoy my little game!

Some tips:

Controls are displayed before the match! But if you really want to know:

  • - Player 1 controls flippers with A and D and skills with left control, left shift, and caps lock.
  • - Player 2 controls flippers with left and right arrow and skills with right control, right shift and enter.
  • - plunger is being controlled by space.

Multiplier in the middle gives you 1 point more after scoring a goal for every 1000 points!

Every player has 3 skills to use! They can help you score a goal, defend yourself or just make more chaos!
